titles.title: Weatherization Assistance Act
To provide for the establishment of a program of assistance to States for consultations with respect to weatherization and energy efficiency.
Weatherization Assistance Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

bill.summary:
Weatherization Assistance Act - Instructs the Secretary of Energy to establish a program of assistance to states for consultations about weatherization and energy efficiency of residences and small businesses.
Declares a state eligible for such assistance if it receives funding under the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981.
Limits residential consultations under the assistance program to those for which the household income does not exceed 200% of the state median income for households of the same size.
Authorizes appropriations for FY2007-2011.
